nodes.text: Toric Bisilt was a Bothan who served in the Thaereian military during the Clone Wars.

Bisilt was a Lieutenant aboard the CR90 corvette Thaere Runner. It was used as a customs patrol ship in the Cularin system and he asked the Heroes of Cularin some questions after they docked their ship with it while there.
Bisilt was mentioned in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, in the entries of Jarl Narvis and Gille Narvis.
